alert.note: Alert for Pottawatomie (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 14 at 11:19PM CDT by NWS Topeka
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Pottawatomie County through MIDNIGHT CDT... At 1118 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 4 miles north of Onaga to 4 miles southeast of Manhattan. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Northeastern Manhattan, Westmoreland, Onaga, St. George, Louisville, Havensville and Wheaton. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Heavy rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized ponding of water on roads. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until midnight CDT for northeastern Kansas.
